attributes.action: Outlaw the practice of offering multiple quantities of a product for the price of less.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The practice known as BOGOF - Buy One Get One Free encourages excessive consumption, and excessive waste when applied to perishable goods. It should be more accurately described as Buy One Get One You Don't Need! Furthermore it discriminates against single person and old people households; where the ability to consume/store the increased quantities is diminished. BOGOFs are already illegal in certain areas of the continent where the equivalent sales tool is a straight forward price reduction.
